args: I won't let anyone hurt you!
(I know that name all too well... Those\nmonsters murdered my tribe—along with\nFelyx and Fydon's parents.)
Are you sure you're all right?
Y-yes. But I'm afraid we must be going.
More stops to make, eh?\nTake care!
Thank you! Have a merry Dragonyule!
(I need to get these two back to the\ncastle, fast!)
(Please let our journey home be safe.\nPlease!)
So someone was following us after all...\nHah!
Dammit... My son said those dragons just\nhad a reindeer with them, not some\nguardian!
What's that look for?\nWe ain't here for you.
Just give us the dragons,\nand you're free to go.
You know that means we gotta kill you,\nright?
As an Aegis, I won't let any harm befall\nthem!
You won't have your way this time!\nI'll make you pay for the lives you stole!
Oooh, I remember now! You're one'a\nthem savages that shelter dragons\nin the mountains!
I thought we slaughtered 'em all,\nbut I guess we can finish that now!
Urgh... He's no pushover. If you see an\nopening to kill those dragons, take it!
Why are you so intent on exterminating\ndragons?! What could they have possibly\ndone to deserve that?!
My tribe was peaceful... Why did they\nhave to die?! And what of these dragons'\nparents?!
Stay close, you two.\nI won't let them get you!
Peaceful? Hah! Dragons took EVERYTHING\nfrom us—why should they be protected?!
Pfft. You know that dragon your tribe\nwas protecting?

I'll never forget it. One moment we're livin'
in peace, and then suddenly this huge
storm blows in and crushes all the
houses—along with everyone inside 'em.
I looked up to the sky and saw a dragon,\nway up above the clouds. Didn't take\nme long to put two and two together!
I told some people in neighboring villages,\nbut you know what they said? That we\nwere ＂unlucky＂ for bein' in a dragon's path!
You asked me what dragons ever did to us.\nWell, what did WE ever do to THEM?!
My people just wanted to live in peace,\nand now they're dead!
I didn't know... This is the first I've ever\nheard of that! And that's why you decided\nto take revenge on us?
That's right. When someone hurts you,\nyou gotta make them feel just as bad.\nOr worse!
We joined up with a nation that shared our\nideals. It's like paradise.
They're all about ridding the world of\ndragons! So now we fight with them.
So Amane is from a country bent\non exterminating dragons?
That's right. Her village was destroyed\nby one, and she was the sole survivor.
That she alone prevailed, despite her\nyouth, earned her the title ＂Child of\nMiracles.＂
Does the country you speak of support\nsomeone called the Child of Miracles?
Heh. You did your homework huh?\nIt sure does.
But she doesn't actually do any fighting\nherself. That's...OUR JOB!
And anyone who gets in our way\nhas a shallow grave waiting!
Come on! Are you gonna dance,\nor are we gonna finish this?
(All this time, I thought our village fell\nvictim to senseless violence...)
(And thinking about people attacking\ndragons merely for being dragons\nfilled me with endless anger...)
(But if what they're saying is true...)
(Then the injustice in their eyes is—)
Heh. No one ever tell you not to daydream\nin battle?
With a wound like that, you're\ndone fightin'!\nNow die, dragons!
